title: Looking for talkative people to level with (Discord)
body:
Hello there, I am looking for friendly and talkative people to level with. Why talkative? because my native language is not english and I want to learn english while I have fun, I know this sound a little strange, but if you have the patience to play with me and your are a talkative person add me! 

My english speaking is really really bad and is a little difficult to me understand all but in letters I can understand the most. I wanna get better in the auditive matter and I think the only way is listening and speaking to true native english speakers.

I am a main support but I can and I like adc and mid too.

If you have the patience and want play with me: 

Nick: Foxleonex
Discord: Foxleone#8433

When the transfers get fixed I wanna get my lv 30 acc, if any want to ranked duo or flex

replies.body:
We've actually got a Discord Community setup and mostly run by the player base! a lot of players use it to look for premade teams and such, and they have some voice chat rooms setup as well I believe. I'm sure you'd be able to find some friendly/helpful players there ^_^!

Discord Link: https://discordapp.com/invite/leaguecommunity
What's your language, if you don't mind me asking? There might be people who want to learn some of your language too.
Hello there, spanish is my native language
